attributes.title: #SAVETIKTOK
attributes.review: TRUMP IF YOU ARE READING THIS....I just want you to know that if you ban or delete TikTok it isn’t gonna be good....the more events u have the less people will show up...why...because we will buy seats and not come and we will not support you...this may not seem like a big deal to you but a lot of tiktokers have a WHOLE CAREER from TikTok and you don’t need to just take that away....it’s very unprofessional.

attributes.title: judy judy baboody
attributes.review: the app is so unorganized and absolutely terrifying. my younger cousin got into my phone and saw this app, once they opened it they were absolutely frightened and traumatized it took HOURS for them to stop crying. absolutely unacceptable. we also don’t support people that won’t bat an eye to the people of the country, a president is an example of a leader but instead trump is the opposite a decent and respectful human.

attributes.title: Not very nice
attributes.review: This app keeps crashing my cellular device. I do not understand why anyone would want this app when they can get all their news from a nicer place like twitter because that’s a totally reliable source. Try getting your news from unbiased sources for example The Hill is a good one. I would give this app 0 stars if I could. Ok bye everyone.

attributes.title: Not Good
attributes.review: There were so many technical glitches and the app simply wouldn’t start up for me. So annoying! But besides the problems with the app itself, I could only view photos of beans when it FINALLY decided to open. There were so many and I just could not figure out why! Very poor, unhelpful, and annoying. Overall not good!

This WAS THE WORST HORRIBLE app on the app store and I was hoping for this app to ✨make 🍊america🇺🇸 again 🤡 BUT it was working so s l o w and I couldn’t deal with it. I have a fast working wifi and I even switched to LTE to make this app go faster but it was glitchy and orange. Yes, orange. It had some very ugly pictures❤️ I don’t think this app deserves to take up space in the app store. It’s ✨worthless✨ just, no❤️

attributes.title: glitching issues
attributes.review: there wasn’t an option to vote for an actual good president 😔 I encourage others to not downloaded it , this app stole my bank information and made my phone catch a virus and then catch on fire. what a world we live in where downloading an app can cause you to lose your only form of connection a to people( a cell phone ) 😢

attributes.title: Awful service
attributes.review: This app is slow and when you open it it shows things that will give you nightmares it takes about a day just to download this app and when you open it. It takes forever just to load a picture. And it shows so much negativity it shouldn’t even be on the App Store.

attributes.title: This is Disgusting
attributes.review: I downloaded the app today but when I opened the app I could see flashes of photos. I wanted to dig deeper into this to find out what it was about so I took a screenshot when I opened the app to find numerous pictures of naked women. I hope this app is taken down forever as we now know this app is actually a way for our disgusting president to store nudes. Disgusting.

attributes.title: Terriable and glitchy!😡
attributes.review: I tried this app thinking it would be so useful! But right when I singed in it crashed my iPhone and kicked me out. It finally let me in after it crashing multiple times but it was to glitchy to do anything! And may I add I have the newest iPhone so it should not be a problem and not be this glitchy and kick me out!

attributes.title: This app has inspired me❤️ to go blind 💫🧚‍♂️😍
attributes.review: I opened up the app to worship our lovely orange and immediately all of the objects in the room started levitating and then a bunch of policemen burst threw the door and threw me out the window, but thankfully Gordon Ramsay caught me, saving my life. The policemen started chasing us and I started running away until the big orange himself tried to run over me with their limo. Terrible experience 😊
